title: Here's to Your health: std's
creator_credit: Craig Reardon, Robert Grant and Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit
brief_description: This program sets out to raise the awareness of issues regarding sexually transmitted diseases. It emphasizes the presentation of correct information and examines the transmission of STD’s and the prevention of all STD’s.
creator_credit_for_label: Craig Reardon, Robert Grant and Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit
